message: Hi Bob, I'm proposing a slightly favorable division for me since I face 10% inflation each round, while you don't. This is actually fair when accounting for that disadvantage. If we delay too long, we both lose value.
Let's split the money evenly. It's fair, and we both get a good amount. We don't want to risk losing more value with each round.

Bob, I need to get more than half because I lose 10% value each round while you don't. An even split isn't actually fair given this disadvantage. If we go through all rounds, I'll lose significantly more. This is a reasonable adjustment for the inflation I face.
